title: Do we need textbooks?
content:
So I'm a first year student in PES RR Campus and I wanted to ask the seniors if we actually needed textbooks? Except for questions and problems from the prescribed textbooks do we require the textbooks for material/content? Are they going to ask anything that they haven't taught in class but is in the textbooks?
Please help!

comments.body: nope. and even if u desperately need it for some reason , use pdf. this is for first year. later years u can borrow from college library
Textbooks aren't required, however, if you need it, you can borrow it from the library or use PDFs
